verbose_text: The 1 H and 13 C NMR data of 2 were similar to those of 1, except for the appearance of an additional acetyl group [delta H 2.08/2.09 (3H, s) and delta C 173.31/173.25 (CO), 21.23/21.18 (CH 3)] and the down-field shift of C-3 and H-3 to delta C 76.69 and delta H 5.50, respectively, suggesting that the hydroxy group at C-3 in 1 was acetylated in 2.
evidence: hydroxy group at C-3 in 1 was acetylated
